channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：波音公司的 737 MAX 生产过程在质量控制方面存在数十个问题。据《纽约时报》报道，美国联邦航空局（FAA）的审计显示，在 89 项产品测试中，这家航空巨头有 33 项不合格
item.description:
WATCH: Boeing's 737 MAX production process has dozens of issues with quality control. According to the New York Times, an audit from the FAA revealed that the aerospace giant failed 33 out of 89 product tests https://t.co/822O7Xcgwx pic.twitter.com/0i4iqVhM5w

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：ALINE Wealth 首席投资官彼得-克莱因（Peter Klein）表示，尽管 S&P 全球水务指数（S&P Global Water Index）的表现不如大盘，但 "现在必须对水务行业进行投资，因为这是至关重要的"。
item.description:
WATCH: Peter Klein, Chief Investment Officer at ALINE Wealth, says that investment in the water industry ‘has to happen now because it is critical stuff,’ even though the S&P Global Water Index has underperformed the wider market pic.twitter.com/V1CgnxaN1F

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 中国国务院总理李强不打算在即将于 3 月底举行的中国发展高层论坛上与到访的外国首席执行官会面，这引发了人们对中国政府在情绪低落之际吸引海外投资的承诺的担忧。
item.description:
Chinese Premier Li Qiang does not intend to hold a meeting with visiting foreign CEOs at the upcoming China Development Forum in late March, raising concerns about Beijing's commitment to attract investment from abroad at a time of souring sentiment https://t.co/J5acgczdKJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 独家报道中国总理李克强将不出席重要商业峰会与全球首席执行官会面
item.description:
Exclusive: Chinese Premier Li to skip meeting with global CEOs at key business summit https://t.co/WqouskzNx6 pic.twitter.com/aAhDDIQbk1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 摆脱香港的价值陷阱绝非易事
item.description:
Breakingviews - Escaping Hong Kong's value trap is far from cheap https://t.co/Gj0dNLDTnN https://t.co/Gj0dNLDTnN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：特斯拉位于德国柏林附近的千兆工厂已恢复供电，上周附近的电塔遭到纵火袭击，导致数亿欧元的损失，这家电动汽车制造商因此断电。
item.description:
WATCH: Tesla has seen power restored at its gigafactory near Berlin in Germany as the EV maker had been without electricity after an arson attack on a nearby pylon last week leading to hundreds of millions of euros in damages https://t.co/gbiuoBYNUh pic.twitter.com/04i73fRPiu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 渣打银行肯尼亚分行 2023 年税前利润跃升 15
item.description:
Standard Chartered Kenya's pre-tax profit jumps 15% in 2023 https://t.co/6UWk9LS6d6 pic.twitter.com/smw0q1x3J1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，日本经济正在复苏，但也显示出一些疲软迹象，与1月份相比，上田一夫的评估略显暗淡，这与最近一系列疲软的消费数据有关。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said the economy was recovering but also showing some signs of weakness, offering a slightly bleaker assessment than in January in a nod to a recent batch of soft data on consumption. More here: https://t.co/sJZybm6Hh6

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 纽约商业银行完成 10 亿美元注资交易，宣布反向拆股
item.description:
NYCB closes $1 bln capital infusion deal, announces reverse stock split https://t.co/uSASqL7nf8 pic.twitter.com/XFxST1u84z

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国 500 指数和纳斯达克指数小幅收跌，原因是投资者在为本周的消费者和生产者价格数据做准备，他们希望通过这些数据更好地了解美联储是否能在未来几个月内开始降息。更多信息
item.description:
The S&P 500 and Nasdaq ended down slightly as investors prepared for this week's consumer and producer price data, which they hope will provide a better idea of whether the Federal Reserve can begin cutting interest rates in the coming months. Read more https://t.co/fpVUaiFjfF pic.twitter.com/ET8OzCUBc5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在一项新的研究中，特斯拉的自动驾驶和完全自动驾驶技术以及主要汽车制造商销售的其他九种辅助驾驶系统获得了美国公路安全保险协会的 "差 "评级。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Tesla's Autopilot and Full Self Driving technology and nine other assisted-driving systems marketed by major automakers received ‘poor’ ratings from the US Insurance Institute for Highway Safety in a new study. More here: https://t.co/AYSrzYvVRI

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 韩国土地部长表示，随着韩国人口迅速老龄化和经济增长放缓，房价不会再像过去那样大幅上涨。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
South Korea won't see a repeat of the sharp home price gains it did in the past as its population rapidly ages and economy slows, the country's land minister said, vowing to promote public rental accommodation to improve access to housing. More here: https://t.co/7z5wcfzTe8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 英国银行有更多时间检查付款是否被骗
item.description:
Britain's banks given more time to check payments for scams https://t.co/rpZvFiOEJA pic.twitter.com/4D39LMwzDQ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 华特迪士尼回应亿万富翁纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）及其特里亚基金（Trian Fund）为赢得两个董事会席位而发起的竞选活动，在这场日益激烈的代理权争夺战中，对激进股东的动机和资格进行了抨击。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Walt Disney responded to billionaire Nelson Peltz and his Trian Fund's campaign to win two board seats with an attack on the activist shareholder's motivations and qualifications in an increasingly bare-knuckled proxy battle. More here: https://t.co/A2QBya7I3c

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 比特币周一创下了 72000 美元以上的历史新高，这种最大的加密货币的飙升势头丝毫没有放缓的迹象。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
Bitcoin hit a record high on Monday above $72,000, as the biggest cryptocurrency's surge showed no signs of slowing down. More here: https://t.co/H5lWs0m2wY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在最新通胀数据公布前一天，美国股市收盘多数下跌，该数据可能为美联储何时开始降息提供更多线索。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
US stocks ended mostly lower, a day ahead of the latest inflation data, which could provide more clues on when the Federal Reserve might start cutting rates. More here: https://t.co/fpVUaiFR5d pic.twitter.com/NBuINfFL0C

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：Reddit 及其部分现有投资者正计划出售约 2,200 万股股票，每股价格介于 31 美元至 34 美元之间，以筹集高达 7.48 亿美元的资金。
item.description:
WATCH: Reddit, along with some of its existing investors, is targeting a sale of about 22 million shares, priced between $31 and $34 each, to raise up to $748 million as it approaches one of the most-anticipated stock market debuts of the year https://t.co/tZcodCF1bZ pic.twitter.com/8PtHYUrJMN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 350 亿美元的天然气重聚追踪着跌宕起伏的市场
item.description:
Breakingviews - A $35 bln gas reunion tracks a topsy-turvy market https://t.co/9fdf6Ar61B https://t.co/9fdf6Ar61B

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 埃及与国际货币基金组织（IMF）签署了扩大后的 80 亿美元贷款协议。皮埃尔-布里安孔认为，如果基金组织对未来改革的乐观态度没有得到阿卜杜勒-法塔赫-塞西总统的证实，那么埃及将面临对 1,650 亿美元外债进行痛苦重组的局面。
item.description:
Egypt signed an expanded $8 billion loan deal with the IMF. If the Fund's optimism about future reforms is not justified by President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, a painful restructuring of the $165 billion external debt lies ahead, according to Pierre Briancon https://t.co/sqAri5G4XF pic.twitter.com/AzeYfzJE1y

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 解说员：纽约立法者再次解决主权债务重修问题
item.description:
Explainer: New York lawmakers tackle sovereign debt reworks again https://t.co/rxoRp3zig2 pic.twitter.com/zAeKfgBFNb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: Zara 的所有者 Inditex 面临着投资者的呼吁，要求其公布全部供应商名单，以便投资者更好地评估环境影响和劳工实践等方面的风险。H&M和Primark等竞争对手已经公布了他们从哪些工厂采购。
item.description:
Zara-owner Inditex faces calls from investors to make public its full list of suppliers so they can better assess risks over things like environmental impact and labor practices. Rivals like H&M and Primark already publish which factories they source from https://t.co/7m4gxw5Wwd pic.twitter.com/ImkKOtSSju

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 350 亿美元的天然气重聚追踪着跌宕起伏的市场

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：社交媒体平台 Reddit 表示，其美国首次公开募股（IPO）的目标估值将高达 64 亿美元，这是过去几年中最受瞩目的股市首次公开募股之一。
item.description:
WATCH: Reddit aims for a valuation of up to $6.4 billion in its US IPO, the social media platform said, as it nears one of the most-anticipated stock market debuts of the last few years https://t.co/tZcodCF1bZ pic.twitter.com/Nrv248JBSv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：比特币首次突破 70,000 美元大关，在欧洲交易中上涨了 4.8%，达到创纪录的 71,677 美元，使今年迄今为止的涨幅达到 70
item.description:
WATCH: Bitcoin surged past the $70,000 mark for the first time and rose by as much as 4.8% to a record $71,677 in European trading, bringing gains for the year so far to 70% https://t.co/JHt0rsXjhX pic.twitter.com/m1bt825uV8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在阿联酋注入 350 亿美元现金后，开罗获得了国际货币基金组织 80 亿美元的贷款。皮埃尔-布里安孔说，如果阿卜杜勒-法塔赫-塞西总统不能证明基金组织对改革的乐观态度是正确的，那么前面就是对 1,650 亿美元外债的重组。
item.description:
Cairo received an $8 billion IMF loan after a $35 billion cash injection from the UAE. If President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi doesn't justify the Fund's optimism about reforms, a restructuring of the $165 billion external debt lies ahead, Pierre Briancon says https://t.co/sqAri5G4XF pic.twitter.com/Vgsb4b93Nx

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 汇丰将在美国招聘近 50 名银行家为初创企业和风险企业提供贷款服务
item.description:
HSBC to hire almost 50 bankers for startup, venture lending in US https://t.co/YrhknpuFaN pic.twitter.com/ukq7vq2nyN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024
